channel.title: Can I add Chinese to Satisfactory Mod Manager?
channel.description: Can I add Chinese to Satisfactory Mod Manager? There are also many small partners in China who want to install MOD to increase the playability! But most people do not have good English. For example, I wrote articles using Google Translate! awkward! If you can! We will be happy！Thank you!

item.title: Can I add Chinese to Satisfactory Mod Manager?

item.description:

Can I add Chinese to Satisfactory Mod Manager? There are also many small partners in China who want to install MOD to increase the playability! But most people do not have good English. For example, I wrote articles using Google Translate! awkward! If you can! We will be happy！Thank you!
